question: Comet Encke orbits the sun every 60 years. David's father saw the Comet when he was 21 years old. David saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his father was when he saw the Comet. How old was David when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
David saw the Comet for the second time when he was 21 years * 3= <<21*3=63>>63 years old.
Comet Encke can be seen every 60 years, so David saw the comet for the first time when he was 63 years - 60 years = <<63-60=3>>3 years old.
